title: Ed Davey to boycott Trump state banquet over Gaza
description: The Lib Dem leader says he wants to send the president a message that he has the power to end the crisis.
body: The Lib Dem leader says he wants to send the president a message that he has the power to end the crisis.

title: Reform UK retreats from child migrant deportations
description: Nigel Farage has now ruled out the suggestion, after the party's former chair said it could happen.
body: Nigel Farage has now ruled out the suggestion, after the party's former chair said it could happen.

title: Conservative MSP Graham Simpson defects to Reform
description: Simpson announced his move as he appeared at a press conference in Scotland with Reform leader Nigel Farage.
body: Simpson announced his move as he appeared at a press conference in Scotland with Reform leader Nigel Farage.

title: Minister takes on Nigel Farage over Brexit deal
description: Nick Thomas-Symonds says Reform UK would "take Britain backwards" if it ripped up the Brexit reset.
body: Nick Thomas-Symonds says Reform UK would "take Britain backwards" if it ripped up the Brexit reset.

title: NHS to lose out on new drugs, pharma firm warns
description: The claims from pharmaceutical giant Novartis comes amid a row over drug pricing deals.
body: The claims from pharmaceutical giant Novartis comes amid a row over drug pricing deals.

title: Brexit: NI sea border for food 'in place until 2027'
description: The border for such goods will not be dismantled until 2027, the UK government is expected to confirm.
body: The border for such goods will not be dismantled until 2027, the UK government is expected to confirm.

title: Domestic abuse screening tool doesn't work, minister says
description: The safeguarding minister says the Dash questionnaire has "obvious problems" but is the best authorities have for now.
body: The safeguarding minister says the Dash questionnaire has "obvious problems" but is the best authorities have for now.
